sentences.en: A bubble so large also required aggressive mortgage originators, imprudent home buyers and myopic investors.
sentences.cn: 如此大的泡沫还需要有野心勃勃的抵押贷款发放者 、 轻率的购房者和短视的投资者参与其中.

sentences.en: But hold on energy supplies imprudent optimism, no good at all.
sentences.cn: 但对能源供给持不谨慎的乐观, 并无益处.

sentences.en: I told him that I thought it would be imprudent.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他我认为那样做将是轻率的.

sentences.en: In my view, she was imprudent.
sentences.cn: 依我看, 她未免太轻率了.

sentences.en: It was imprudent for France to indulge this trait when she was so grievously weakened.
sentences.cn: 法国在遭到如此严重削弱的关头,便犯这种脾气,那是很轻率的事.

sentences.en: It was imprudent of you to lend money to a stranger.
sentences.cn: 你把钱借给陌生人,未免太轻率了.

sentences.en: It was rather imprudent of the little girl to interrupt our conversation like that.
sentences.cn: 这丫头,打断我们的谈话,没轻没重的.

sentences.en: It would be imprudent of you to make enemies of those who can help you.
sentences.cn: 与能帮助你的人为敌将是不明智的.

sentences.en: It would be imprudent to invest all your money in one company.
sentences.cn: 把所有的钱都投资在一家公司是不明智的。

sentences.en: It's imprudent of you to have done such a thing.
My imprudent utterances incurred her displeasure.
sentences.cn: 我的鲁莽言论招致她的不悦.

sentences.en: So what should I do about those imprudent things I said about the Senior VP?
sentences.cn: 那么对于我说的那些有关副总裁的轻率的话,我该怎么办 呢 ?

sentences.en: The banks made hundreds of imprudent loans in the 1970s.
sentences.cn: 20世纪70年代那几家银行轻率地发放了几百笔贷款。

sentences.en: Your cousin Melchior was imprudent with his investments and got into a very queer street.
sentences.cn: 你表兄梅尔基奥投资太不小心,负了很多债.
